title: Showdown dialog doesn't show levels beyond 2 for White Lion
description:
When opening the showdown dialog for White Lion, only levels up to Level 2 are shown. Level 3 and other variants (Beast of Sorrow, etc.) are not displayed in the selection.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Open showdown dialog
2. Select White Lion
3. Observe available levels

## Expected
All White Lion levels should be visible: Prologue, The Young Lion, Level 1, Level 2, Level 3, Radiant Lion, Beast of Sorrow

## Actual
Only levels up to Level 2 are shown

- [ ] Template contains Aya's Spear and Aya's Sword

title: Showdown resource rewards button
description:
Add a button to spawn resource rewards after winning a showdown.

## User Story

As a player, after winning a showdown, I want to press a button that automatically draws my resource rewards so that I don't have to manually search through resource decks.

## Current Pain Point

After winning a showdown, players must:
1. Look up which resources they earned (basic + monster-specific)
2. Manually search through the basic resource deck
3. Manually search through the monster resource deck
4. Draw the correct number of random cards from each

## Requirements

### Button Location
- Southeast of the rulebook panel (see screenshot reference)

### Button Availability
- Available from showdown start until cleanup phase
- Disabled if monster has no resource rewards

### Behavior
When pressed:
1. Determine active showdown (monster type + level)
2. Look up resource rewards for that monster/level (from rulebook data)
3. Draw random cards from:
   - Basic resource deck (number depends on monster/level)
   - Monster-specific resource deck (number depends on monster/level)
4. Spawn drawn cards to the left of the settlement board (between showdown board and settlement board)

### Multiple Press Handling
- First press: spawn resources immediately
- Subsequent presses: show confirmation dialog warning that resources were already spawned

### Data Requirements
- Reward data per monster per level (from rulebook):
  - Number of basic resources to draw
  - Number of monster-specific resources to draw
- Monster type + level determined by active showdown

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Button appears southeast of rulebook when showdown starts
- [ ] Button disabled if monster has no resource rewards
- [ ] Button spawns correct number of basic resources for current monster/level
- [ ] Button spawns correct number of monster resources for current monster/level
- [ ] Resources spawn to designated area (left of settlement board)
- [ ] Second press shows confirmation dialog before spawning again
- [ ] Button remains available until cleanup phase
- [ ] Works for White Lion (at minimum for initial implementation)

## Screenshots

Button location: ~/Desktop/screenshot1.jpg (red marking SE of rulebook)
Spawn location: ~/Desktop/screenshot2.jpg (red circle between boards)
